about.title: About me
about.paragraphOne: Hi, I'm Systems Engineer, I love creating web applications, based on requirements that meet the needs of the problem. I have worked both in the development of user interfaces, as in the handling and saving of the data.
about.paragraphTwo: Responsible, eager to acquire new knowledge for my personal strengthening.

contact.title: Contact
contact.cta: Would you like to work with me? Awesome!
